name: youcrypted.com
body:
> “Every person in the world should be able to generate and maintain private data, do private communication..., be respected as a human being!”
>
> Rolando Santamaría Masó: “The Encrypted Communication Platform 10.01.2015”

### Introduction.
youcryted.com pretends to be an encrypted communication platform to provide 100% of protection and confidentiality for user's data. Stands on the principle of peer-to-peer encrypted communication by combining AES-256 and XSalsa20 encryption algorithms.
For users, the 100% encrypted and secure social network. For apps, devices, machines, the 100% encrypted and secure communication platform.

#### Under development:
youcrypted.com modules are under development, meanwhile you can explore available modules:
```
git clone https://github.com/youcrypted/chess-characters-pwd.git
https://github.com/youcrypted/chess-characters-pwd

git clone https://github.com/youcrypted/keys-service.git
https://github.com/youcrypted/keys-service
```

#### License
youcrypted.com technology is released as open-source software under the Apache 2.0 License.

### Want to Join?
If you are interested on participate, contribute, be part of the team, do not hesitate to contact the author: [Rolando SM](mailto:kyberneees@gmail.com)
